title: Event Marketing For The Dangers of Techno-Feudalism Talk Series
description: Drive visibility and engagement for a conference uniting thinkers, activists, and academics critiquing techno-feudalism—the consolidation of power by digital platforms and algorithmic systems. I’ll design and execute a multi-channel campaign (social, newsletters, media outreach, partnerships) to highlight the urgency of these conversations and attract the right audience.

milestones.title: Phase 1 – Positioning & Messaging
milestones.description: Develop a strong narrative framework that captures the stakes of techno-feudalism (concentration of power, erosion of democracy, worker precarity). Create brand assets, talking points, and media kits that position the conference as the leading forum on the issue.

milestones.title: Phase 2 – Audience Outreach & Campaign Rollout
milestones.description: Run digital campaigns targeting academics, journalists, and activists; foster partnerships with progressive organizations; and amplify voices of key speakers through content drops and video teasers. Drive early RSVPs with thought-leadership articles and community engagement.

milestones.title: Phase 3 – Event Amplification & Legacy Building
milestones.description: Manage live coverage during the conference (live tweets, recap reels, press placements) and publish a post-event whitepaper or highlight reel. Ensure the conference’s ideas outlast the event itself by building a digital archive and ongoing community channel.
